description: Alnasca Knit II Low GTX® Men approach shoe – form follows function. With Basefit for excellent hold and reduced blister formation. Michelin OCX Compound enables close contact with the rocks and provides excellent grip, even in wet conditions. Gore-Tex® ensures that feet remain dry. The flexible knitted upper material has a sock-like construction for a perfect fit. Alnasca Knit II Low GTX® Men – form follows function.
name: Mammut Alnasca Knit II Low GTX - Mens

specs.value: Sliding webbing transfers power from lacing area to soles, ensuring improved

The three-dimensionally shaped TPU element is designed for the anatomy of the heel bone, which it completely envelops. This delivers optimum heel fit, helps prevent twisted ankles and protects against rock abrasion
